case.title: ARE YOU MARRIED?
case.text: 1.82ft average build University educated to post-graduate level financially comfortable male in his 60's married but by now in a brother/sister situation looking for attractive female 35-50 in a similar predicament for a little adulterous adventure. You should be married and living with husband/children in other words have a normal family life. Divorcees, separated need not reply as the whole thrill of the matter is secretiveness and absolute discretion
